description: Toxicroak, like Croagunk, is based on the poison dart frog. Toxicroak has knuckle talons and, instead of cheek pouches, a large vocal sac. Toxicroak has large leg and arm muscles, necessary for jumping and punching. Commander Saturn owns a female Toxicroak. These Pok√©mon prey on Drapion, and vice versa.
name: Dokurog
